name: VouchedFor
overview:
VouchedFor lets users choose a fee-based Independent Financial Advisor (IFA) based on past users’ reviews and ratings.

Today, the only real way to find an Independent Financial Advisor you can trust is through personal recommendations from your own network. Peer review models have already proved a far more effective selection tool in many other local-search situations.

VouchedFor only features fee-based Independent Financial Advisors. From 2013, all IFAs will have to operate on a fee-basis, with commission being outlawed due to the hidden incentives it creates.

Users can compare IFAs based on location, qualification, service level, eligibility criteria and clients’ reviews.

VouchedFor is a UK company.
